lead_paragraph: The app, a curated list of stories intended to broaden The Times’s reader base, will no longer be available to download starting the week of Aug. 29.

headline.print_headline: Times Shuts Down the Curated News App NYT Now
headline.main: New York Times to Shelve NYT Now App

snippet: The app, a curated list of stories intended to broaden The Times’s reader base, will no longer be available to download starting the week of Aug. 29....
abstract: New York Times says it is shutting down its curated news app NYT Now.
